heroes.name: Sleeping Dog
heroes.info: As soon as an enemy appears in range this unit will jump on it and destroy it

heroes.name: Sleeping Dog 2
heroes.info: As soon as an enemy appears in range this unit will jump on it and destroy it

heroes.name: Unleashed beauty
heroes.info: As soon as an enemy appears in range this unit will jump on it and destroy it if she can. Can trigger multiple times in a turn

heroes.name: Unleashed beauty 2
heroes.info: As soon as an enemy appears in range this unit will jump on it and destroy it if she can. Can trigger multiple times in a turn

heroes.name: Assassin
heroes.info: Can only jump on unit if it can kill it

heroes.name: Assassin 2
heroes.info: Can only jump on unit if it can kill it

heroes.name: Eliminator
heroes.info: Can only jump on unit if it can kill it. Enemy is not injured but placed on discard pile

heroes.name: Eliminator 2
heroes.info: Can only jump on unit if it can kill it. Enemy is not injured but placed on discard pile

heroes.name: Ninja warrior
heroes.info: Can only jump on unit if it can kill it. After a kill reallocate it on the map, just as you would do when adding a new hero

heroes.name: Ninja warrior 2
heroes.info: Can only jump on unit if it can kill it. After a kill reallocate it on the map, just as you would do when adding a new hero
